tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE spacecraft_parts (
    part_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    part_name VARCHAR(255),
    part_description TEXT,
    quantity INT,
    location VARCHAR(100),
    last_maintenance_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE spacecraft_components (
    component_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    component_name VARCHAR(255),
    component_description TEXT,
    part_id INT,
    quantity INT,
    cost DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE spacecraft_parts (
  part_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  part_name TEXT,
  part_type TEXT,
  quantity INT,
  location TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE spacecraft_components (
  component_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  part_id INT REFERENCES spacecraft_parts(part_id),
  component_name TEXT,
  serial_number TEXT,
  location TEXT,
  condition TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE maintenance_records (
  record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  component_id INT REFERENCES spacecraft_components(component_id),
  maintenance_date DATE,
  maintenance_type TEXT,
  technician TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE replacement_parts (
  replacement_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  part_id INT REFERENCES spacecraft_parts(part_id),
  new_part_name TEXT,
  quantity INT,
  replacement_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE spacecraft_components (
  component_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  component_name VARCHAR(50),
  part_id INT REFERENCES spacecraft_parts(part_id),
  component_type VARCHAR(50),
  component_status VARCHAR(50)
);
